title: I understand voters’ frustrations, Sunak says in live TV grilling
description: As peers in the House of Lords debated draft legislation aimed at sending asylum seekers to Kigali, one voter asked Mr Sunak why he was “so adamant” about the Rwanda policy “when public documentation shows it isn’t working and that it’s not going to work”.

title: You will put Starmer in No 10, Sunak warns Reform voters
description: Credit: Matt Pover/GB News Rishi Sunak has told Reform UK supporters that they will put Sir Keir Starmer’s Labour Party into Number 10 unless they vote Conservative in a plea on live television. Answering questions from voters in County Durham on GB News ...

title: Labour withdraws support for Rochdale candidate
description: Labour says it has “withdrawn support” for Rochdale by-election candidate Azhar Ali following his comments about Israel. The BBC understands Mr Ali has been suspended from the Labour Party pending an investigation. Labour said the decision was taken after "new information about further comments" made by Mr Ali came to light.

title: Ex-Bank of England chief economist 'laments' Labour U-turn on £28bn green pledge
description: Ex-Bank of England chief economist 'laments' Labour U-turn on £28bn green pledge Speaking to Sky's Sophy Ridge, Andy Haldane said the original promise "led the world" in ambition, and would have benefitted Britain - both in achieving its net zero goals and stimulating growth.

title: Rogue councillors criticised for ignoring voters

title: Labour Withdraws Support For Rochdale By-Election Candidate After Anti-Israel Comments
description: The Labour Party has withdrawn its support for Rochdale by-election candidate Azhar Ali after a backlash over his remarks about Israel, a party spokesperson has said. It comes after The Mail on Sunday reported the councillor allegedly said Israel deliberately allowed 1,400 people to be killed on its own soil on October 7.
